mapper.insert: insert into g_goods (GOODS_ID, GOODS_SN, GOODS_NAME, KEYWORDS, CATY_ID, CATY_SN, BUSINESS_ID, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRY_DAYS, GOODS_BRIEF, MARKET_PRICE, DISCOUNT, SHOP_PRICE, PROMOTE_PRICE, PROMOTE_START_DATE, PROMOTE_END_DATE, COUPON_SN, IS_ONSALE, SHIP_FEE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, GOODS_DESC ) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catySn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expiryDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{promotePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{promoteStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{promoteEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{couponSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOnsale,jdbcType=BIT}, #{shipFee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update g_goods set GOODS_SN = #{goodsSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEYWORDS = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATY_ID = #{catyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATY_SN = #{catySn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EFFECTIVE_DATE = #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPIRY_DAYS = #{expiryDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GOODS_BRIEF = #{goodsBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARKET_PRICE = #{marketPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DISCOUNT = #{discount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SHOP_PRICE = #{shopPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROMOTE_PRICE = #{promotePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROMOTE_START_DATE = #{promoteStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROMOTE_END_DATE = #{promoteEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COUPON_SN = #{couponSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_ONSALE = #{isOnsale,jdbcType=BIT}, SHIP_FEE = #{shipFee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_DESC = #{goodsDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select GOODS_ID, GOODS_SN, GOODS_NAME, KEYWORDS, CATY_ID, CATY_SN, BUSINESS_ID, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRY_DAYS, GOODS_BRIEF, MARKET_PRICE, DISCOUNT, SHOP_PRICE, PROMOTE_PRICE, PROMOTE_START_DATE, PROMOTE_END_DATE, COUPON_SN, IS_ONSALE, SHIP_FEE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, GOODS_DESC from g_goods where GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select GOODS_ID, GOODS_SN, GOODS_NAME, KEYWORDS, CATY_ID, CATY_SN, BUSINESS_ID, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRY_DAYS, GOODS_BRIEF, MARKET_PRICE, DISCOUNT, SHOP_PRICE, PROMOTE_PRICE, PROMOTE_START_DATE, PROMOTE_END_DATE, COUPON_SN, IS_ONSALE, SHIP_FEE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, GOODS_DESC from g_goods
